channel.title: Wildy

item.title: Wildy
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

umm i forgot how to do it, but there is something you can put under ’ public void writePlayers() {’

so it can tell players if their in a safezone or in the wildy. and i was wondering if any knew how or if this would be it, i just though it would be this but im not quite sure:

if(inwildy2 && !nonWild()) { sendFrame126("@red@ WILDY", 13594); } else if(nonWild() && inwildy2 && leftwild == 1) { sendFrame126("@gre@ SAFE ZONE", 13595);

Read full topic
